title: Chanelle Hayes showcases her incredible figure in a patterned, cut-out swimsuit in Tenerife
text:
She lost an incredible three stone earlier this year after a dedicated regime of exercise and healthy eating.

And Chanelle Hayes happily showcased the fruits of her labour as she sported a pretty orange-patterned cut-out swimsuit while on a girly break to Tenerife last week.

The former Big Brother star, 31, appeared confident as she flaunted her slimmer frame in the stylish swimwear after enjoying a dip in the pool at her hotel.

Stunning: Chanelle Hayes happily showcased the fruits of her labour as she sported a pretty orange-patterned cut-out swimsuit while on a girly break to Tenerife last week

The swimsuit featured a white top half adored with oranges and cute polka dots, with the tie detail drawing attention to the star's ample bust.

The bottom half was a pattern of pink and white stripes, with the swimwear featuring a cut-out feature at the stomach showcasing Chanelle's weight loss.

The beauty added a pair of metallic over-sized sunglasses to her look, while her wet, raven tresses cascaded down her back.

Taking a break from the blazing Spanish heat, the reality star slipped into the swimming pool to cool off, scraping her locks into a messy topknot as she did so.

Looking good: The former Big Brother star, 31, appeared confident as she flaunted her slimmer frame in the stylish swimwear after enjoying a dip in the pool at her hotel

Bikini babe: The swimsuit featured a white top half adored with oranges and cute polka dots, with the tie detail drawing attention to the star's ample bust

Chanelle then stepped under a shower, pointing her legs as she did so, so as to display her trimmed down figure to perfection.

She has been very vocal about her weight loss journey, keeping her fans updated with her process over the months.

And her hard work certainly seems to be paying off as she happily showcased her much slimmer physique while enjoying a day by the swimming pool of her hotel.

Lovely: The bottom half was a pattern of pink and white stripes, with the swimwear featuring a cut-out feature at the stomach showcasing Chanelle's weight loss

Finishing touches: The beauty added a pair of metallic over-sized sunglasses to her look, while her wet, raven tresses cascaded down her back

Cool down: Finishing touches: The beauty added a pair of metallic over-sized sunglasses to her look, while her wet, raven tresses cascaded down her back

The star, who first shot to fame in 2007 as a feisty 19-year-old contestant on Big Brother, regularly posts Instagram updates documenting how she'd been doing as she continued her fitness regime.

In April this year she shared a before and after snap of herself which showed off her much slimmer frame.

Accompanying the snap, the star wrote: 'It’s spurring me on to get to my goal!! From no waist to waist! From too tight sleeves to sleeves that fit! From leggings to jeans. From big calves to toned calves. From lethargic to energetic. From insecure to more confident.

'When I see my progress from all it does it spur me on to get to where I want to be. And I will. LET’S DO THIS.'

Refreshing: Chanelle cooled off as she plunged into the dazzling blue waters of her hotel's swimming pool

Work it: Chanelle then stepped under a shower, pointing her legs as she did so, so as to display her trimmed down figure to perfection

Shower time: Chanelle looked relieved to take some respite some the sizzling Spanish sun

Meanwhile, Chanelle revealed in May that she had lost more than three stone and gone down to a size 12 for the first time in three years.

She happily shared a snap of herself in her skinny jeans, where she detailed how confident she felt after shedding enough weight to slip back into them.

She penned: 'THIS IS OFFICIALLY THE SMALLEST I HAVE BEEN SINCE SUMMER 2016!!

'So in November for my birthday I wore a size 18-20 jumpsuit and hated it, felt like [poo emoji]. I’ve put in a lot of effort and hard work and I can now fit into my size 12s.

Fame: She rose to fame on the 2007 series of Big Brother, she was just 19 (pictured in 2007)

'DON’T GET ME WRONG- these jeans are nice and stretchy lol. But my belt is on the smallest hole and could do with being a bit tighter, I have no overhang and I feel confident. I have lots of other 12s that still don’t fit yet, but the fact that these do is helping me keep going until I get where I want to be.'

Later that month she revealed yet another before and after photo of herself in a black jumpsuit, she said: 'November 2018 vs May 2019 Size 18-20 outfit vs size 12 outfit 15st 6lbs vs 11st 13lbs 84 RHR vs 54 RHR.'

Chanelle revealed that she had gained 'more confidence and happiness' since losing weight.

And though back in August she revealed that she had crept back up to size 14 after six weeks of bad eating while on holiday, Chanelle wowed to get back in track and it's clear that her hard work has paid off.
description: The former Big Brother star, 31, appeared confident as she flaunted her slimmer frame in a pretty orange-patterned cut-out swimsuit while on a girly break to Tenerife last week.
